## QuadTreeEventTargetProvider class

Incrementally updatable entity quad tree target provider. The yield time can be configured by setting [IQuadTreeTargetOptions.yieldTime](./core.iquadtreetargetoptions.yieldtime.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QuadTreeEventTargetProvider<TPlotRange extends IPlotRange> implements IPlotEventTargetProvider<IDefaultTargets>, IDefaultTargets 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IPlotEventTargetProvider](./core.iploteventtargetprovider.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IDefaultTargets](./core.idefaulttargets.md)<!-- -->&gt;, [IDefaultTargets](./core.idefaulttargets.md)
